name: Diamond Management and Technology Consultants
overview: Diamond Management & Technology Consultants and its subsidiaries provide management and technology consulting services worldwide. The company offers skills in strategy, information technology (IT), operations, and program management. It manages technology and business transformations, information management strategies, and compliance and risk management services, as well as assesses various technologies for financial services industry. The company advises and collaborates with insurance industry to help them unlock the business strategies, such as marketing and sales investments; exploiting the use of information through insight and decision making; creating product and service delivery architectures; designing solutions to meet the retirement populationsâ€™ needs; and enhancing distribution service platforms.
